content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

GO

-- Create a new external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
    (    LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR (15),
        Zone VARCHAR (50),
        service_zone VARCHAR (15))
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_ldw,
       FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
     );

     SELECT * FROM bronze.taxi_zone
     GO
